MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 01-DEC-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan, affecting properties in Caledonian Crescent and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and  to complete a repair on a pillar located outside 32 Winterhope Road we had to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.20am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.36am on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
